short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an Add On for Salezshark Connect +

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What is Connect+ Chrome Extension?

Connect+ Chrome extension offers you the easiest way to convert the ample of fruitful opportunities you're sitting on into an actionable B2B database entailing direct dials, emails, and much more! It helps you to get access to the most relevant B2B contact information with just one click. It enables your sales professionals to send one-to-one personalized emails, schedule follow-ups, and track them from Gmail. The top sales experts use our services to identify and capture accurate B2B contact details that shorten their sales discovery and help them to close more deals.

How does it Work?

Connect+ Chrome extension helps you to capture leads as you browse the web. It empowers you to find the email addresses behind the websites you're browsing. It also offers you the easiest way to identify and capture your future customers and get their contact details in a few clicks. It helps you to:

Identify & Capture contacts from any website you visit 
Create targeted leads lists of contacts that matter to your business simply by clicking the Connect+ chrome extension icon and save the necessary contacts.

Smart sourcing from LinkedIn
Identify and capture new LinkedIn leads with 100% verified business email addresses in a few seconds.

Integrate seamlessly with your CRM
Once you download the Connect+ Chrome extension, it can be synced with your account, and starts extracting fully compliant prospect and company data from LinkedIn or Gmail and sends it directly to Connect+ Prospector or to your CRM.

Formulate a scalable ABM (Account-Based Marketing) strategy
Connect + helps you to get access to millions of verified B2B contacts entailing the email addresses and direct dials of decision-makers in your target companies with just a few clicks. With the world's best B2B data, available in your Chrome browser you can formulate a scalable ABM strategy easily.

Get Accurate Data for your Sales & Marketing Pipeline
Connect+ Chrome extension helps sales and marketing professionals to get the access to most verified B2B emails and connect with relevant people. Hence it results in establishing a fast and true connection with your leads, contacts, and clients.

What Information Will You Receive from Connect+ Chrome Extension?

Connect+ makes your content more action-oriented by adding business information, like contact information, positions, and company information. It empowers you with the capability to contact your leads directly from our Chrome extension by integrating your email account if you choose that option to do so. Connect+ is an industry leader with expertise in providing the most accurate information and best hit rates which help you turn the leads into deals.

Who Should Get Connect+ Chrome Extension?

Connect+ Chrome extension is meant to be used by all working professionals who have profiles like sales, recruiters, lead generators, headhunters, account managers, marketing experts, business developers, and professionals with direct client relationships.

Why Connect+?

•	The easiest way to find anyone's email address and phone number.
•	All the contact are captured and verified on a real-time basis.
•	Export captured contacts easily to CSV files.
•	Capture contact details in bulk.
•	Perfect for outbound and inbound salespeople using a Gmail account to engage with leads. 
•	Improves your productivity by saving a lot of productive hours.
